Group.Title: UI Timeouts
Group.Description: Timeouts for Various stages of Transaction

Parameter.Title: Business Phone
Parameter.Description: Enter Business Phone here for receipt

Parameter.Title: MCR limit
Parameter.Description: Trans value limit above which txns will route to EFTPOS

Parameter.Title: MCR Upper limit
Parameter.Description: Trans value limit below which txns will route to EFTPOS

Parameter.Title: Manager User Name
Parameter.Description: Manager User Name for Manager login

Parameter.Title: 4 to 6 Digit Manager User ID
Parameter.Description: Manager User ID for Manager login

Parameter.Title: 6 to 12 Digit Manager Initial PIN
Parameter.Description: Initial PIN for Manager User ID (you will be prompted to change this at first login)

Parameter.Title: Technician User Name
Parameter.Description: Technician User Name for Technician login

Parameter.Title: 4 to 6 Digit Technician User ID
Parameter.Description: Technician User ID for Technician login

Parameter.Title: 6 to 12 Digit Technician Initial PIN
Parameter.Description: Initial PIN for Technician User ID (you will be prompted to change this at first login)

Parameter.Title: Max Refund Limit
Parameter.Description: Terminal Max Amount For Refund Limit

Parameter.Title: Manager's Refund Limit
Parameter.Description: Max Amount For Refund Limit as Manager

Parameter.Title: Max Cumulative Refund Limit Amount
Parameter.Description: Maximum refund amount in a day

Parameter.Title: Max EFB Transactions
Parameter.Description: Maximum number of EFB Transactions allowed

Parameter.Title: Override CTLS CVM Limit Enabled
Parameter.Description: Flag to override CTLS CVM limit with the one below

Parameter.Title: Override CTLS CVM Limit
Parameter.Description: Override CTLS CVM limit. Value is cents, with no decimal

Parameter.Title: EFB Plastic Card's Life, days
Parameter.Description: The time period (days) from now when card expiry date must be less than.

Parameter.Title: EFB Continue in Fallback Timer Timeout, minutes
Parameter.Description: The time period after the last transaction without host response when terminal enters "Continue in Fallback" mode. In this mode the terminal will attempt EFB without trying to reach the host.

Parameter.Title: EFB Allowed Approval by AuthNumber Over Floor Limit
EMV fallback to MSR
Parameter.Description: EMV fallback to MSR enabled Y/N

Parameter.Title: Custom Result Audio
Parameter.Description: Custom Audio playback for transaction results as defined by the resources in the app

Parameter.Title: Screen Off Time
Parameter.Select: {"15 secs":"15 secs","30 secs":"30 secs","1 min":"1 min","2 min":"2 min","5 min":"5 min","30 min":"30 min","disabled":"disabled"}

Parameter.Title: PCI Reboot Time of the Day (HHMM)
Parameter.Description: PCI Reboot Time of the Day

Parameter.Title: Automatic Settlement Time of the Day (HHMM)
Parameter.Description: Automatic Settlement Time of the Day

Parameter.Title: Number of days trans history to keep on terminal
Parameter.Description: Number of previous days (settlement periods) transaction history to keep on terminal, not including current trading day. Completed transactions older than this will be automatically deleted from the terminals memory

Parameter.Title: Passcode Security Supported
Parameter.Description: Flag to disable the Passcode Security.Passcode protected functions should still prompt for the passcode

Parameter.Title: User Passcode Retry Limit
Parameter.Description: Number of Failed Passcode Attempts Before Account or Function is Locked. Capped to Max 24 attempts

Parameter.Title: Bad Passcode Attempt Window (minutes)
Parameter.Description: Time Window for Failed Passcode Attempts.

Parameter.Title: Bad Passcode Lockout Duration (minutes)
Parameter.Description: Lockout Duration. of Time Window for Failed Passcode Attempts.

Parameter.Title: Passcode Maximum age(days)
Parameter.Description: Number of Days after which Passcode must be reset.Maximum Age for Passcode

Parameter.Title: Refund Password Retry Limit
Parameter.Description: Number of Failed Refund Password Attempts Before Transaction Cancel.

Parameter.Title: Moto Password Retry Limit
Parameter.Description: Number of Failed MOTO Password Attempts Before Transaction Cancel.

Parameter.Title: RRN Entry Retry Limit
Parameter.Description: Number of Failed RRN Attempts Before Transaction Cancel.

Parameter.Title: Auth Code Entry Retry Limit
Parameter.Description: Number of Failed Authcode Attempts Before Transaction Cancel.

Parameter.Title: Comms type
Parameter.Select: {"POS_ROUTED":"Route via POS","TWO_BYTE_LENGTH_FIVE_BYTE_TPDU_HEADER_TCP_DIRECT":"TCP Direct TPDU Header","TWO_BYTE_LENGTH_TCP_DIRECT":"TCP Direct No TPDU","IP_GATEWAY_PROXY_APP":"IP Gateway Proxy"}

Parameter.Title: POS comms Host ID
Parameter.Description: Host ID for routing transactions via EFT Server

Parameter.Title: Root CA Certificate File (PEM format)
Parameter.Description: SSL Root CA Certificate File (PEM format)

Parameter.Title: SSL Client Private Key Certificate File
Acquirer host response timeout for Reversal & Advice (sec)
Parameter.Description: Acquirer host response timeout for reversal/advice (sec)

Parameter.Title: Comms fallback enabled
Parameter.Description: Fallback to secondary comms method (e.g. 4G) if primary internet connection (e.g. WiFi, Ethernet) is down

Parameter.Title: Comms Fallback Test Host:Port
Parameter.Description: Internet test host + port to use when checking health of primary internet connection. Only used when in 'fallback' mode

Parameter.Title: GoInsight Upload Transactions
Parameter.Description: Upload transaction data to Paxstore and GoInsight

Parameter.Title: Merchant Store Name
Parameter.Description: Merchant store name for the receipt

Parameter.Title: Email Host (Server)
Parameter.Description: Email server to use for receipts

Parameter.Title: Issuer Deferred Auths Enabled for Transit/Flight Mode Transactions
Issuer Deferred Auths Enabled for Transit/Flight Mode Transactions
Issuer Deferred Auths Enabled for Transit/Flight Mode Transactions
Issuer Deferred Auths Enabled for Transit/Flight Mode Transactions
Issuer Deferred Auths Enabled for Transit/Flight Mode Transactions
Issuer Deferred Auths Enabled for Transit/Flight Mode Transactions
Issuer Deferred Auths Enabled for Transit/Flight Mode Transactions
Card product or CPAT file (e.g. cardproduct.json or CPAT.txt)
Parameter.Description: Card product or CPAT file (e.g. cardproduct.json or CPAT.txt)

Parameter.Title: PKT file (optional, EMV/CTLS public key file)
Parameter.Description: PKT file (optional, EMV/CTLS public key file)

Parameter.Title: default cards mapping file, e.g. cards.xml
Parameter.Description: default cards mapping file, e.g. cards.xml

Parameter.Title: Access Mode Decision Screen Timeout
Parameter.Description: Access Mode Decision Screen Timeout (Approved, Cancelled, Declined)

Parameter.Title: Flight Offline Mode Allowed
Parameter.Description: True if system flight mode should be used to determine if transactions are to be performed offline. Note offline transactions may still be allowed if this is set to N, according to rules below

Parameter.Title: Offline Max Transaction Amount Limit - Contact
Parameter.Description: Maximum allowed transaction value in offline mode for Contact/Insert transactions

Parameter.Title: Offline Max Transaction Amount Limit - Contactless
Parameter.Description: Maximum allowed transaction value in offline mode for Contactless/Tap transactions

Parameter.Title: Offline Stored Transaction Soft Limit Amount (Dollars)
Parameter.Description: A warning will be displayed to the user if stored trans amount will exceed this $ limit. Transaction will still be allowed

Parameter.Title: Offline Stored Transaction Soft Limit Count
Parameter.Description: A warning will be displayed to the user if stored trans count will exceed this limit. Transaction will still be allowed

Parameter.Title: Offline Stored Transaction Upper Limit Amount (Dollars)
Parameter.Description: Transaction will not be allowed if $ total of stored offline transactions exceeds this limit

Parameter.Title: Offline Stored Transaction Upper Limit Count
Parameter.Description: Transaction will not be allowed if count of offline transactions exceeds this limit

Parameter.Title: Unattended Mode Allowed
Parameter.Description: True if system unattended mode should be used to determine if transactions are to be performed in petrol payment scenarios.
